name: seedbed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area of ground prepared for growing plants from seeds: Prepare the seedbed thoroughly first, being sure to eliminate all weeds.
a situation from which something develops: They perceive politics as the seedbed of corruption. The discussions will serve as a seedbed for ideas.
